attributes.additional_details:
1000's of people try to quit smoking every day, the majority of smokers wish they could stop yet the simple fact one of the most addictive & dangerous drugs is so easily available sees most cigarette addicts return to smoking.

If you're a smoker that wants to quit, sign this petition

If you're a none smoker who wants a loved one to quit, sign this petition

& if you're an ex smoker who knows how hard it is to quit, sign this petition.

One day, if tobacco is no longer available to buy at every general store, supermarket & off licence, the UK can be free of this major health risk.

Banning people from smoking isn't the answer, banning the sale of tobacco is.

BAN THE SALE OF TOBACCO
